item.title: Workflow name
item.description: This section is identified by the keyword name. The name is used as an identifier for the current application workflow. This is useful as it is possible to distinguish different application workflows running on the same machine. Example { "name" :"my_workflow", }

item.title: Alias
I/O Graph
item.description: This section defines the dependencies between input and output streams between application modules comprising the workflow.
